description: This file defines a Data Access Object (DAO) interface for performing database operations related to 'Note' entities in an Android app using Room persistence library.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: An interface annotated with @Dao, providing methods for CRUD operations and custom queries on 'Note' entities in a Room database.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new Note entity into the database.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Note entity in the database.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Note entity from the database.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by creation timestamp in descending order.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its unique ID.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches notes where the title or content contains the search term.

methods.name: getNotesByCategory
methods.description: Retrieves notes filtered by a specific category.
